00023 W.refresh = function(){
00024   var db = document.body;
00025   if(window.innerWidth != null){
00026     this.width = window.innerWidth;
00027     this.height = window.innerHeight;
00028   }else if(window.opera != null){
00029     this.width = db.clientWidth;
00030     this.height = db.clientHeight;
00031   }else if(document.documentE1lement != null){  // IE or others
00032     this.width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
00033     this.height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
00034   }
00035   // store in Int-type
00036   this.width = parseInt(this.width);
00037   this.height = parseInt(this.height);
00038   // inherit the browser workspace size onto the W.body
00039   this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00040   this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00041 };

00053 W.scroll = function(isAuto){
00054   if(isAuto){
00055     document.write('<style>html {overflow: auto;}<\/style>');
00056     //document.write('<style>html {overflow-x: auto;overflow-y: auto;}<\/style>');
00057   }else document.write('<style>html {overflow: hidden;}<\/style>');
00058     //}else document.write('<style>html {overflow-x: hidden;overflow-y: hidden; '
00059     //      +'overflow: hidden;}<\/style>');
00060   document.close();
00061 };

00064 W.background = function(bg){
00065   if(!bg) return;
00066   document.body.style.background = bg;
00067 };

00078 W.init = function(){
00079   // build initial namespace library
00080   for(var i in window) W.names += i +',';
00081 
00082   // append the mother of all presentation layers
00083   this.body = document.createElement('div');
00084   // has no footprint
00085   this.body.style.display = 'inline';
00086   // trick: get document.body ready
00087   if(!document.body){
00088     document.write('<div id="_wednus_platform_" style="display:none;'
00089     +'position:absolute;">.</div>');
00090   }
00091   document.body.appendChild(this.body);
00092 
00093   // code holder: handles issue eval backslash contains string
00094   this.code = document.createElement('textarea');
00095   this.code.style.display = 'none';
00096   document.body.appendChild(this.code);
00097   // auto scrollbars
00098   this.scroll(false);
00099   // update workspace size
00100   this.refresh();
00101 
00102   // get path if it's from wednus_compact.js loading
00103   if(this.path == '') this.autopath();
00104 };

00107 // by doing this, we can block 'i' being exposed to the global namespace
00108 (function(){
00109   // width of workspace
00110   W.width = 0;
00111   // height of workspace
00112   W.height = 0;
